docs.snippet: Buccaneers kicker Connor Barth will miss the season with a torn Achilles’ tendon, and the team signed Lawrence Tynes, a former Giant, as his replacement....
docs.lead_paragraph: Buccaneers kicker Connor Barth will miss the season with a torn Achilles’ tendon, and the team signed Lawrence Tynes, a former Giant, as his replacement.
docs.abstract: Tampa Bay Buccaneers sign kicker Lawrence Tynes to replace Connor Barth, who will miss the upcoming season with a torn Achilles' tendon; other NFL news noted.

headline.main: With Barth Set to Miss Season, Buccaneers Sign Tynes

docs.snippet: The only freshman to win a Heisman Trophy, Texas A&M’s Johnny Manziel said he saw himself as a fun-loving student and not as a celebrity....
docs.lead_paragraph: The only freshman to win a Heisman Trophy, Texas A&M’s Johnny Manziel said he saw himself as a fun-loving student and not as a celebrity.
docs.abstract: Texas A&M quarterback Johnny Manziel, who last year became the only freshman to win the Heisman Trophy, defends his whirlwind off-season; comments come at SEC Media Days, the Southeastern Conference's annual three-day affair at which coaches and players talk about the coming college football season.

docs.snippet: The decision is perhaps the biggest development in a battle focused on the rights of college athletes in how their likenesses can be used and what, if any, compensation they should receive....
docs.lead_paragraph: The decision is perhaps the biggest development in a battle focused on the rights of college athletes in how their likenesses can be used and what, if any, compensation they should receive.
docs.abstract: NCAA, after years of hearing concerns that video games bearing its name and logo infringed on the rights of student-athletes, announces that it will not renew its contract with Electronic Arts.

headline.main: As Legal Battle Continues, N.C.A.A. Ends Tie With Electronic Arts
headline.print_headline: N.C.A.A. Ends Its Tie With a Game Maker

docs.snippet: It was the museum’s first summer gala in the new building, and spirits were high even if the coiffures were lower than usual....
docs.lead_paragraph: It was the museum’s first summer gala in the new building, and spirits were high even if the coiffures were lower than usual.
docs.abstract: Parrish Art Museum hosts its first summer gala in its new building in Water Mill, NY, drawing art-loving guests to mingle and survey the Hamptons museum's 14-acre site.

headline.main: Scene City: The Parrish Art Museum’s Summer Benefit
headline.print_headline: Pack Up the Tent for Good

docs.snippet: An engaged couple and three others are charged with stealing financial information and using it to go on expensive trips and buy tickets to sporting events....
docs.lead_paragraph: An engaged couple and three others are charged with stealing financial information and using it to go on expensive trips and buy tickets to sporting events.
docs.abstract: Amanda Zieminski and Clyde Forteau, along with three others, are charged with stealing financial information and using it to issue fake credit cards to fuel spending sprees;  prosecutors say Zieminski, who worked for South Shore Physicians on Staten Island and had access to patients' financial records, is at the center of the credit card fraud ring.

headline.main: Prosecutors Say Five Ran a Credit Card Fraud Ring
headline.print_headline: Prosecutors Say Five Ran A Credit Card Fraud Ring
